item.title: Dart Completion in Neovim using Language Server Protocol
item.description: In this short and simple tutorial we will add Dart completion to Neovim using Language Server Protocol. First of all I will suppose that you already have install Neovim and Dart in your machine. List of programs that we will need: dart_language_server LanguageClient-neovim (Neovim Plugin) nvim-completion-manager (Neovim Plugin) Step 1. Install dart_language_server Since we already have Dart installed, we can install dart_language_server with this command: pub global activate dart_language_server Add the .
